route = env['edi.route'].search([('id', '=', env['ir.model.data'].xmlid_to_res_id('edi_af_krom_postcode.asok_postcode_route'))]) record = env['res.partner'].sudo().search([('customer_id', '=', '2279')]) vals = { 'name': 'get krom postcode msg', 'edi_type': env.ref('edi_af_krom_postcode.asok_postcode').id, 'model': record._name, 'res_id': record.id, 'route_id': route.id, 'route_type': 'edi_af_as_krom_postcode', }
msg = env['edi.message'].sudo().create(vals) msg.pack() route.run()
